epi:questionnaire.epi:author: PA team
epi:questionnaire.epi:title: RPAQ
epi:questionnaire.epi:subtitle: Recent Physical Activity Questionnaire
epi:questionnaire.epi:info: This questionnaire is designed to find out about your physical activity in your everyday life in the last 4 weeks
This questionnaire is divided into 3 sections.
Please try to answer every question.
asks about your physical activity patterns in and around the house.
is about travel to work and your activity at work.
asks about recreations that you may have engaged in during the last 4 weeks.
Your answers will be treated as strictly confidential and will be used only for medical research.

epi:section.epi:title: Introduction
epi:section.epi:info: RPAQ
Recent Physical Activity Questionnaire
This questionnaire is designed to find out about your physical activity in your everyday life in the last 4 weeks
This questionnaire is divided into 3 sections.
Please try to answer every question (use the scroll bar on every page to make sure you answered all the questions).
Section A asks about your physical activity patterns in and around the house.
Section B is about travel to work and your activity at work.
Section C asks about recreations that you may have engaged in during the last 4 weeks.
Your answers will be treated as strictly confidential and will be used only for medical research.

epi:section.epi:title: Home Activities
epi:section.epi:info: User the inner scroll bar to make sure you answered all the questions.

epi:questionGroup.epi:title: Getting About
epi:questionGroup.epi:info: Which form of transport have you used most often in the last 4 weeks apart from your journey to and from work?

epi:textNode.epi:info: Hours of TV, DVD or video watched per day
On a weekend day before 6 pm
On a weekend day after 6 pm

epi:questionGroup.epi:title: Computer use at home but not at work e.g. internet, email, Playstation, Gameboy, Xbox and Wii (non-active games only)

epi:textNode.epi:info: Hours of home computer use per day
On a weekend day before 6 pm
On a weekend day after 6 pm
Number of times you climbed up a flight of stairs (approx 10 steps) each day at home

epi:section.epi:title: Activity at work
epi:section.epi:info: Please answer this section to describe if you have been in paid employment at any time during the last 4 weeks or you have done regular, organised voluntary work.

epi:textNode.epi:info: Have you been in employment during the last 4 weeks?

epi:questionGroup.epi:info: During the last 4 weeks how many hours work did you do per week?

epi:rule.name: CheckDataType
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Please provide a round number, e.g. instead of entering 2.5hours please enter 2hours 30minutes

epi:rule.name: AboveOrEqualMin
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Please provide a round number above 0

epi:rule.name: BelowOrEqualMax
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Please provide a round number below 168

epi:rule.epi:parameter: Are you sure you worked for that many hours 4 weeks ago?

epi:questionGroup.epi:info: Think about a typical week in the last 4 weeks. How many days did you usually work during the week and weekend?

epi:textNode.epi:info: Typical week in the last 4 weeks

epi:rule.name: AboveOrEqualMin
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Please provide a round number above 0

epi:rule.name: BelowOrEqualMax
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Please provide a round number below 5

epi:rule.name: AboveOrEqualMin
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Please provide a round number above 0

epi:rule.name: BelowOrEqualMax
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Please provide a round number below 2

epi:questionGroup.epi:title: Type of work
epi:questionGroup.epi:info: We would like to know the type and amount of physical activity involved in your work. Please choose the option that best corresponds with your occupation(s) in the last 4 weeks from the following four possibilities:

epi:option.epi:optionText: You spend most of your time sitting (such as in an office)
You spend most of your time standing or walking. However, your work does not require intense physical effort (e.g. shop assistant, hairdresser, guard)
This involves some physical effort, including handling of heavy objects and use of tools (e.g. plumber, electrician, carpenter)
This implies very vigorous physical activity including handling of very heavy objects (e.g. dock worker, miner, bricklayer, construction worker)

epi:questionGroup.epi:title: Travel to and from work in the last 4 weeks
epi:questionGroup.epi:info: What is the approximate distance from your home to your work?

epi:rule.name: BelowOrEqualWarningMax
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Are you sure this is the distance from your home to your work?

epi:rule.name: BelowOrEqualWarningMax
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Are you sure this is the distance from your home to your work?

epi:textNode.epi:info: Select here if you work from home or multiple locations:
How many times a week did you travel from home to your main work?

epi:rule.name: BelowOrEqualWarningMax
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Are you sure you travel from home to your main work that many times a week?

epi:textNode.epi:info: How did you normally travel to work?

epi:questionGroup.epi:info: What is the postcode for your main place of work during the last 4 weeks?

epi:rule.name: MatchesPatternIfAnswered
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Are you sure this postcode is correct?

epi:textNode.epi:info: If not known please give your work address

epi:questionGroup.epi:info: What is the postcode for your home address?

epi:rule.name: MatchesPatternIfAnswered
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Are you sure this postcode is correct?

epi:section.epi:title: Recreation
epi:section.epi:info: The following questions ask about how you spent you leisure time.
Please indicate how often you did each activity on average over the last 4 weeks.
Please indicate the average length of time that you spent doing the activity on each occasion.
Example:
If you went walking for pleasure for 40 minutes once a week.
If you had done weeding or pruning every fortnight and took 1 hour and 10 minutes on each occasion.
You would complete the table below as follows:
Please give an answer for the NUMBER OF TIMES you did the following activities in the past 4 weeks and the AVERAGE TIME you spent on each activity.
Please complete EACH line
resources/section_example.gif
Now complete the table on the next page

epi:questionGroup.epi:info: Please give an answer for the average time you spent on each activity and the number of times you did that activity in the past 4 weeks

epi:textNode.epi:info: Number of times you did the activity in the last 4 weeks
2 to 3 times in the last 4 weeks
